text: (21:6) The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="07760 06440">turn</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05197" class="">speak out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="04720" class="">sanctuaries</st>. <st data-num="05012" class="">Prophesy</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>
and say to them, ‘This is what the Lord says: Look, I am against you. I will draw my sword from its sheath and cut off from you both the righteous and the wicked.

<st data-num="03282 0834">Because</st> I will <st data-num="03772" class="">cut off</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> you both the <st data-num="06662" class="">righteous</st> and the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st>, my <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> will <st data-num="03651 03318">go out</st> from its <st data-num="08593" class="">sheath</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> <st data-num="03605 01320">everyone</st><n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>.
Then everyone will know that I am the Lord, who drew my sword from its sheath—it will not be sheathed again!’
“And you, son of man, groan with an aching heart and bitterness; groan before their eyes.

When they ask you, ‘Why are you groaning?’ you will reply, ‘Because of the report that has come. Every heart will melt with fear and every hand will be limp; everyone will faint, and every knee will be wet with urine.’ Pay attention—it is coming and it will happen, declares the Sovereign Lord.”
The Lord’s message came to me:

“Son of man, prophesy and say: ‘This is what the Lord says:

“‘A sword, a sword is sharpened

and also polished.

It is sharpened for slaughter;

it is polished to flash like lightning!

“‘Should we rejoice in the scepter of my son? No! The sword despises every tree!

“‘He gave it to be polished,

to be grasped in the hand—

the sword is sharpened, it is polished—

giving it into the hand of the executioner.

Cry out and moan, son of man,

for it is wielded against my people,

against all the princes of Israel.

They are delivered up to the sword, along with my people.

Therefore, strike your thigh.
“‘For testing will come, and what will happen when the scepter, which the sword despises, is no more? declares the Sovereign Lord.’

“And you, son of man, prophesy,

and clap your hands together.

Let the sword strike twice, even three times!

It is a sword for slaughter,

a sword for the great slaughter surrounding them.

So hearts melt with fear and many stumble.

At all their gates I have stationed the sword for slaughter.

Ah! It is made to flash, it is drawn for slaughter!

Cut sharply on the right!

Swing to the left,

wherever your edge is appointed to strike.

I too will clap my hands together,

I will exhaust my rage;

I, the Lord, have spoken.”
The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="07760" class="">mark out</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">routes</st> for the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon’s</st> <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">take</st>; <st data-num="08147" class="">both</st> of them will <st data-num="03318" class="">originate</st> in a <st data-num="0259" class="">single</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>. <st data-num="01254" class="">Make</st> a <st data-num="03027" class="">signpost</st> and <st data-num="01254" class="">put</st> it at the <st data-num="07218" class="">beginning</st> of the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> leading to the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.

<st data-num="07760" class="">Mark out</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">routes</st> for the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st> to <st data-num="0935" class="">take</st>: ‘<st data-num="07237" class="">Rabbah</st> of the <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammonites</st>’ and ‘<st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> with <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">in</st> it.’<n id="1" />

<st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">stands</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="0517" class="">fork</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> at the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> of the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">routes</st>. He <st data-num="07080" class="">looks for</st> <st data-num="07081" class="">omens</st>:<n id="2" /> He <st data-num="07043" class="">shakes</st> <st data-num="02671" class="">arrows</st>, he <st data-num="07592" class="">consults</st> <st data-num="08655" class="">idols</st>,<n id="3" /> he <st data-num="07200" class="">examines</st><n id="4" /> animal <st data-num="03516" class="">livers</st>.<n id="5" />

Into his <st data-num="03225" class="">right hand</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">comes</st> the <st data-num="07081" class="">portent</st> for <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>—to <st data-num="07760" class="">set up</st> <st data-num="03733" class="">battering rams</st>, to <st data-num="06605" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">signal</st><n id="2" /> for <st data-num="07524" class="">slaughter</st>, to <st data-num="07311" class="">shout</st> <st data-num="06963" class="">out</st> the <st data-num="08643" class="">battle cry</st>,<n id="3" /> to <st data-num="07760" class="">set up</st> <st data-num="03733" class="">battering rams</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st>, to <st data-num="08210" class="">erect</st> a <st data-num="05550" class="">siege ramp</st>, and to <st data-num="01129" class="">build</st> a <st data-num="01785" class="">siege wall</st>.
But those in Jerusalem will view it as a false omen. They have sworn solemn oaths, but the king of Babylon will accuse them of violations in order to seize them.

“Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: ‘Because you have brought up your own guilt by uncovering your transgressions and revealing your sins through all your actions, for this reason you will be taken by force.

“‘As for you, profane and wicked prince of Israel,

whose day has come, the time of final punishment,

this is what the Sovereign Lord says:

Tear off the turban;

take off the crown!

Things must change.

Exalt the lowly;

bring low the exalted!

A total ruin I will make it!

Indeed, this will not be

until he comes to whom is the right, and I will give it to him.’

“As for you, son of man, prophesy and say, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says concerning the Ammonites and their coming humiliation:

“‘A sword, a sword drawn for slaughter,

polished to consume, to flash like lightning—

while seeing false visions about you

and reading lying omens about you—

to place you on the necks of the profane wicked,

whose day has come,

the time of final punishment.

Return it to its sheath!

In the place where you were created,

in your native land, I will judge you.

I will pour out my anger on you;

the fire of my fury I will blow on you.

I will hand you over to brutal men,

who are skilled in destruction.

You will become fuel for the fire—

your blood will stain the middle of the land;

you will no longer be remembered,

for I, the Lord, have spoken.’”
